markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 9" pfs="Standard">
[Shapechange](/Spells.aspx?ID=278)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 368 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Aakriti](/Deities.aspx?ID=623), [Isis](/Deities.aspx?ID=517), [Wheels Of Innovation](/Deities.aspx?ID=385)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Harnessing your mastery of transformative magic, you take on a mutable form. You transform yourself into any form you could choose with a polymorph spell in your spell repertoire or that you could prepare of 8th level or lower (including any 8th-level or lower heightened versions of spells you know). You choose the type of creature as you Cast the Spell rather than when you prepare it. You can change your form to any other form you could choose with this spell by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. You can Dismiss this spell.
name: Shapechange

</row>

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Transform into a form of your choice repeatedly.
</summary>
summary: Transform into a form of your choice repeatedly.
summary_markdown: Transform into a form of your choice repeatedly.
text: Shapechange Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 368 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Deities Aakriti, Isis, Wheels Of Innovation Cast somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- Harnessing your mastery of transformative magic, you take on a mutable form. You transform yourself into any form you could choose with a polymorph spell in your spell repertoire or that you could prepare of 8th level or lower (including any 8th-level or lower heightened versions of spells you know). You choose the type of creature as you Cast the Spell rather than when you prepare it. You can change your form to any other form you could choose with this spell by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. You can Dismiss this spell.
